topic.title: EMS Procedures Performed Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67802?9" EMS Procedures Performed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Procedures Performed"

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHOULD be selected from
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.03 If EArrest.10 = true, include here as ICD?10 PCS "6A4" For EArrest.03, it is permissible to use NEMSIS value set Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57) 3003001 Attempted Defibrillation = Defibrillation 5A2204Z 3003005 Initiated Chest Compressions: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from these values if necessary 3003003 Attempted Ventilation: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from these values if necessary 3003007 Not Attempted-Considered Futile = Assistance 5A0; SuccessfulObservation = False; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003009 Not Attempted-DNR Orders = Assistance 5A0; SuccessfulObservation = False; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003011 Not Attempted-Signs of Circulation = Assistance 5A0; SuccessfulObservation = False; ReasonNotAttempted required
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.01 goes in effectiveTime.low If an abandoned time is recorded, EArrest.15 goes in effectiveTime.high
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResusctitationDiscontinueReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.62 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode/@code="Aborted" Aborted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.15
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet IVSite 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.56 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.13 Required conditionally if procedure code is intravenous catheterization (E303)
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67542?1" Procedure performed prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67543?9" Number of procedure attempts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67544?7" Procedure successful indicator (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67545?4" Procedure complication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureComplicationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.58 STATIC
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67546?2" Procedure patient response (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSProcedurePerformer
This eMSProcedurePerformer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.46 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.10
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.09, ID equal to the EMS professional's agency ID number
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceConfirmationMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.60 STATIC
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.02. If the confirmation is negated, this SHALL be "NA."
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSAirwayDeviceParticipant
This eMSAirwayDeviceParticipant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSAirwayDeviceParticipantRole
This eMSAirwayDeviceParticipantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice
This playingDevice SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.61 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] eMSAirwayDeviceParticipant
This eMSAirwayDeviceParticipant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSAirwayDeviceParticipantRole
This eMSAirwayDeviceParticipantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice
This playingDevice SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.61 STATIC
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67802?9" EMS Procedures Performed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Procedures Performed"

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHOULD be selected from
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.03 If EArrest.10 = true, include here as ICD?10 PCS "6A4" For EArrest.03, it is permissible to use NEMSIS value set Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57) 3003001 Attempted Defibrillation = Defibrillation 5A2204Z 3003005 Initiated Chest Compressions: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from these values if necessary 3003003 Attempted Ventilation: use more detailed Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Type (2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.57); reader may infer from these values if necessary 3003007 Not Attempted-Considered Futile = Assistance 5A0; SuccessfulObservation = False; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003009 Not Attempted-DNR Orders = Assistance 5A0; SuccessfulObservation = False; ReasonNotAttempted required 3003011 Not Attempted-Signs of Circulation = Assistance 5A0; SuccessfulObservation = False; ReasonNotAttempted required
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.01 goes in effectiveTime.low If an abandoned time is recorded, EArrest.15 goes in effectiveTime.high
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResusctitationDiscontinueReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.62 STATIC
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode/@code="Aborted" Aborted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.15
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet IVSite 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.56 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.13 Required conditionally if procedure code is intravenous catheterization (E303)
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67542?1" Procedure performed prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67543?9" Number of procedure attempts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.05
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67544?7" Procedure successful indicator (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67545?4" Procedure complication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureComplicationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.58 STATIC
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67546?2" Procedure patient response (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PatientConditionChange 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.59 STATIC
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSProcedurePerformer
This eMSProcedurePerformer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.46 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.10
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id
NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.09, ID equal to the EMS professional's agency ID number
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04; required if procedure code is airway placement, i.e., 0CHY7BZ
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceConfirmationMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.60 STATIC
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.02. If the confirmation is negated, this SHALL be "NA."
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSAirwayDeviceParticipant
This eMSAirwayDeviceParticipant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSAirwayDeviceParticipantRole
This eMSAirwayDeviceParticipantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice
This playingDevice SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.61 STATIC
